Trade/Device Name(s): cobas c Tina-quant Lipoprotein (a) Gen.2 assay
cobas c Tina-quant Lipoprotein (a) Gen.2 Test System
Regulation Name(s): Low Density Lipoprotein Immunological Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche Diagnostics cobas c Tina-quant Lipoprotein (a) Gen.2 Test System for quantitative determination of Lp(a) in serum and plasma using immunoturbidimetry
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of lipoprotein(a) in human serum and plasma to evaluate lipid metabolism disorders and assess atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease, including calibration and quality control on Roche clinical chemistry analyzers
